scripts.copy-electron-app: cd ../ && cd electron-app && npm run copy && cd ../ && cd electron-app-test && node ../copy.js src=../electron-app dest=./app
scripts.copy-test-files: cd ../core-renderer/test && npm run copy && cd ../../electron-app-test && node ../copy.js src=../core-renderer/test/tests dest=./app/src/renderer/tests
scripts.copy: npm run copy-electron-app && npm run copy-test-files && npm run copy-env && npm run copy-main-ts && npm run copy-index-ts
scripts.copy-no-app: npm run copy-test-files && npm run copy-env && npm run copy-main-ts
scripts.test: npm run copy && cd app && npm run test
scripts.test-no-copy-app: npm run copy-no-app && cd app && npm run test
